user_query: I want to start a sustainable garden in my backyard. Can you suggest some eco-friendly gardening techniques and provide the carbon footprint of using different types of fertilizers? Oh, and don't forget to fetch the vaccination guidelines for gardening activities.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of eco-friendly gardening techniques.
Analyze the carbon footprint of different types of fertilizers.
Fetch vaccination guidelines relevant to gardening activities.
